mapper.sql: ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{latitude} ) ) * cos( radians(latitude) ) * cos( radians( longitude ) - radians( #{longitude}) ) + sin( radians( #{latitude} ) ) * sin( radians( latitude ) ) ) ) AS distance
mapper.select: select post.*, count(pm_like_id) as likes , from postmap post left outer join postmap_like like on post.pm_id = like.pm_id group by post.pm_id having distance <= 5 order by distance;
select post.* , count(pm_like_id) as likes from postmap post left join postmap_like using(pm_id) where pm_id = #{pmId} group by post.pm_id
mapper.insert: insert into postmap(contents, latitude, longitude, register_id) values(#{contents}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{registerId})
mapper.update: update postmap set contents = #{contents}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude}, register_id = #{registerId} where pm_id = #{pmId}
mapper.delete: delete from postmap where timestampdiff(QUARTER, #{today}, register_date ) <= 1;
mapper.select: select count(*) from postmap_like where pm_id = #{pmId}
